definition: to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
to open/to start/to initiate/to enlighten or awaken/to state/to inform
Qi son of Yu the Great 禹[Yu3], reported founder of the Xia Dynasty 夏朝[Xia4 Chao2] (c. 2070-c. 1600 BC)

sentences.english: Now we have a vending machine that we can turn on and off.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们有了一台可以开启和关闭的自动售货机。

sentences.english: A truck brings in a delivery in through a wide, slow-moving gate.
sentences.chinese: 一辆卡车通过一扇宽阔的缓慢开启的大门运送物资。

sentences.english: He led a six-nation survey this year on media use in the Middle East.
sentences.chinese: 今年他在一个中东媒体上对六个国家开启了一次调查。

sentences.english: The gate to the sublime Dharma was therefore opened there.
sentences.chinese: 锡金正法之门在此开启。

sentences.english: While driving on the bumpy section of the road, he switches on the shock-absorbers.
sentences.chinese: 在路面不平的路段他开启了减震器。

sentences.english: Turn off the TV and read great books. They open doors in your brain.
sentences.chinese: 关掉电视，阅读伟大的著作，它会开启你的智慧之门。

sentences.english: Suspension type thumb nut is used for fastening so that it can be quickly opened up sand downward is conventient for maintenance.
sentences.chinese: 采用碟型活节螺栓紧固，能快速向下开启，便于维修。

sentences.english: Enable the item specified by id in the popup menu.
sentences.chinese: 开启弹出式选单中指定代码的项目。

sentences.english: Upon receiving the bid documents, the bid inviter shall sign for and safe-keep them but may not open them.
sentences.chinese: 招标人收到投标文件后，应当签收保存，不得开启。

sentences.english: Atmospheric pressure acting on the downstream side of the diaphragm forces the diaphragm and seat up.
sentences.chinese: 作用于隔膜下侧的大气压力使隔膜和阀座上升开启。

sentences.english: KIO Exec - Opens remote files, watches modifications, asks for upload.
sentences.chinese: 开启远端档案，监视修改，要求上载。

sentences.english: Lock the exhaust valve inits open position .
sentences.chinese: 把排气阀固定在它的开启位置。

sentences.english: So the Big Bang starts it all.
sentences.chinese: 所以大爆炸开启了这一切。

sentences.english: Relax, play, it will start to flow.
sentences.chinese: 放松，玩，它会开启创意源流。

sentences.english: The chassis is open while the power is on.
sentences.chinese: 电源开启状态下机箱打开。

sentences.english: Slender body, switch on from here.

definition: to open/to show (a ticket)/to turn on/to switch on
to start (a machine)/(fig.) to set in motion/to launch (an operation)/to activate (a plan)
(fig.) to raise the curtain/to lift the curtain/to be a curtain raiser for
direction/strike (i.e. angle of inclination in geology)/inclination/trend/to move towards/to head for
